import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions' const PaymentScreen = ({ history }) => { // useSelector is to grab the cart from the state const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { history.push('/shipping') } // Default paymentMethod is PayPal but can be changed const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) history.push('/placeorder') } return (

Payment Method

Select Method {/* Payment methods Add Form.Check with new payment method */} setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} > {/* setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} > */}
) } export default PaymentScreen
